name: Bard (Drimnit)
description:
Hello There! This is Bard, a personal project of mine.

Bard is a Musical JRPG, mixing elements from both the musical game Genre and classic JRPG games.

At the moment, a really early demo is available for download, in order to test and show the idea out, expect to find some unfinished things and balance issues, yet i hope you enjoy it nontheless.

Controls: Overworld: 

WASD / Arrow keys - Move

ESC - Open Menu / Go Back

ESPACE - Interact / Select

Combat:

Q/W/E - Activate Rail Hitter (In music mode).

ESPACE - Switch to Combat mode (If white action bar is full)

WASD / Arrow keys - Circle through targets (In combat mode).

(This game is still under development, some features and content may not be present, Some art not final).
